string.name: name
string.value: A Chat with Nara the Tour Guide
Nara said a Ripped VIP pass will not work, nor can it be re-published, but the way to leave may be easier by paying a visit to Shuri, the the Tour Guide at Orbis.
Hmmm ... so something as simple as making a new ticket cannot be done, huh. Alright, since I'm here and all, why don't I just take a crack at it til the very end?
So you have my lost VIP pass? Oh no... someone ripped it out. I can't use it as the VIP pass when it's ripped like this!!

This VIP pass is no ordinary ticket; it allows the possessor to freely teleport back and forth from continents to Florina Beach. It's a very special item, so it cannot be reissued... Maybe the other Tour Guide, Shuri, has a clue on what to do with the ticket. Do you want to go see her right now?
Shuri the Tour Guide is currently on duty guiding people on traveling around Orbis. The skies at Ludibrium look beautiful, but I'd much prefer working under the splendid skies, and weather, of Orbis.
Oh, that's unfortunate. The ripped travel ticket really has some value to it, enough to make it a keeper. If you ever find yourself intrigued by this ticket, then talk to me.
I heard about it through Nana of Ludibrium. You have the ripped VIP ticket with you?
Will you show it to me?
This is the VIP pass, indeed. I wonder who would rip it up like this... but then again, if you are interested in this, then I can tell you a way to fix it...
Did you go to Orbis? You still have the ticket ripped in pieces...
